main_definition: Convenient, useful, or easy to use, especially as a tool or gadget.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Easy to access and available when needed
meanings_and_examples.example: It was handy to have the phone within reach during dinner.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Useful in practical matters, especially as a tool or gadget
meanings_and_examples.example: A multitool is very handy for various tasks around the house.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Skillful and adept at doing things quickly and efficiently
meanings_and_examples.example: She's quite handy with her hands, making beautiful crafts effortlessly.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Ready to assist or helpful in a situation
meanings_and_examples.example: He was very handy when it came to explaining complex concepts in simple terms.
